title: unnaruLai eNNI
sahitya:
unnaruLai eNNi eNNi urugudE nenjam un kazhalE shatamenru aDaigudE tanjam


anupallavi

  anbar tanda amudai uNDu aDuttup-paiyattuyilum paramanE


caraNam    anru nI paDaittaLanda aNDam muzhudum uNDu pinnar shabari tanda eccil kaniyum unDu kaLippuDanE
 nandan manai vNNai uNDu maNNai uNDu pOdAdenru andaNar tam avalaiyuNDu paNDukAnil parukkE uNDu bhakti tanil kaTTuNDu vidurar manai virundinilE pazham viDuttut-tOluNDu pashi tIrnda paramanE
